projects.name: Bank Churning System Using Data Analysis and Machine Learning
projects.description: Predict customer churn to help banks retain customers.   Performed exploratory data analysis to identify key features influencing customer churn. Developed and tested multiple machine learning models (Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forest) to predict customer churn.

projects.name: Web Scraping of Amazon page using Selenium and BeautifulSoup
projects.description: Developed a web scraping script to automate the extraction of product names, prices, ratings, and reviews from Amazon. Implemented data cleaning and storage mechanisms to organize the scraped data in a structured format.

projects.name: Mouse Control using Hand Gestures
projects.description: Utilized OpenCV and Mediapipe libraries to capture and process real-time video feed for hand gesture recognition.  Designed an interface for users to control the mouse cursor, click, and scroll using predefined hand gestures.
